II.iii.2.C.2.b
.
Claims for Increase in the Level of Disability
Refer any claim for increase in the level of disability to the rating activity for action after completing any necessary development actions.
Reference
:Â  For information on requesting records and when to order an examination, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.C
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Claims for Increase
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
